name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword for close combat.
looks: A simple blade with a hilt made of iron.

name: Sword of the Dragon
description: A powerful sword forged with dragon scales.
looks: The Sword of the Dragon has a shiny blade made of silver and is adorned with intricate dragon engravings.

name: Sword of Fire
description: A blazing sword that burns its enemies.
looks: The sword has a long, curved blade with flames dancing along its edge. The hilt is made of blackened steel adorned with intricate engravings.

special_effects.burning_touch: Chance to set targets on fire with each hit.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword suitable for close combat.
looks: The sword has a long, straight blade with a silver hilt adorned with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Longsword
looks: The blade is made of steel and the hilt is wrapped in leather

name: Iron Sword
looks: A simple sword made of iron with a leather-wrapped handle.

name: Sword of Fire
description: A mighty sword enchanted with the power of fire.
looks: The sword has a blade made of shimmering red hot flames, with a hilt adorned with intricately designed flames.

name: Sword of the Brave
description: A mighty sword that instills courage in the wielder.
looks: The Sword of the Brave is a longsword made of shining steel with an intricate hilt design and a glowing blue gem embedded in the pommel.

special_effects.courage: Gives a temporary boost to courage, increasing resistance to fear effects.

name: Steel Sword
description: A strong and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The sword has a shiny and polished blade with a hilt wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a simple iron blade and a leather-wrapped hilt.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made from steel.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade and a hilt wrapped in black leather. It has a balanced weight and feels comfortable to hold.

name: Vorpal Blade
description: A deadly sword with a razor-sharp edge that can slice through any material.
looks: The Vorpal Blade is a longsword with a silver blade and a hilt adorned with intricate engravings.

special_effects.vorpal_strike: Has a chance to instantly kill enemies with low health.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of iron.
looks: The sword has a broad blade with a simple hilt and a leather-wrapped handle.

special_effects.parry: Has a 20% chance to parry incoming attacks.
special_effects.bleed: Has a 10% chance to cause bleeding on critial hits.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautiful ring with a large red ruby on top.
looks: The ring is made of gold and has intricate engravings all around the band. The ruby is a deep red color and sparkles in the light.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The sword has a straight, double-edged blade and a hilt wrapped in leather.
